text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! geudaedeul-i eod-eun joh-eun geosdeulgwa naega geudaedeul-eul wihae daejieseo kkeonaen geos-ui ilbulo huisageum-eul naela. geuligo geudaedeul-eun nun-eul gamji anhneun isang chwihaji anh-eul chuhago deoleoun geos-eulo gakkai ga geugeos-eulo huisahaji malla. geudaedeul-eun hananimkkeseo pungjoghasin bun-imyeo yeong-gwangdoesin bun-im-eul alla
